headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts
content:
Those looking to get into the espionage game would be wise to take advantage of one (or several) discounts on offer this week, including 40% off the Mobile Operations Center, plus 30% off MOC Weapon and vehicle workshops, and sales on a range of vehicles including:

Kosatka Sub – 25% off
Nagasaki Stryder – 30% off
Ocelot Ardent – 30% off
Kosatka Sub Upgrades, Mods & Customizations – 25% off

And more! Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
